mapper.select: select b.boardSeq, b.title, b.content, ui.nickname as writer, case when to_char(regdate,'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') = to_char(regdate,'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') then regdate else updatedate end as regdate, b.likey, b.hate, b.isanony from tblBoard b inner join tblUserInfo ui on b.writer = ui.userSeq limit 5;
